TextView.android:text: Stand in a shoulder-width stance with a sligh bend in the knees and one foot positioned slightly in front of you. Clench your hands into fists and draw them to your chin, elbows tucked to your chest. Throw a punch (jab) with your front arm, elbow to your side, and palm down. Quickly return your arm to your side, and palm down. Quickly return your arm to your side. Punch with your other arm, making sure you rotatet hip forward in the direction of the punch. Your back heel will lift off the floor slightly. Pull arm back to starting position.
